basics.name: Dinesh Weerapurage
basics.label: Lead Software Engineer
basics.summary: Dinesh born and raised in Sri Lanka, He erned his computer science degrees from University of Moratuwa and University of Tennessee. As a Software developer, dinesh has worked in two startups, government lab and consulting company. Dinesh is passionate about backend development and cloud deployments. Dinesh enjoys reading, meditating and running when he is not working

work.summary: As a lead software engineer at KPMG, I have engaged in variety of projects advancing breadth and depth of my knowledge on technologies
highlights: Developed a backend, daily porting framework, to serve telecom daily porting data to some of the biggest mobile carriers. I have used Flask, Postgresql, Redis, gunicorn and nginx for this project
Deployed daily porting framework in AWS infrstructure, I used, Cloudfront, autoscaling, ELB and SAML based authentication for the deployment
Developed report generation, Excel and PPT, engine using .Net, Used C# and SqlServer

work.summary: As a research associate, I implemented parallel algothims for graph theory algorithms.
highlights: Implemented parallel algorithm to solve maximum independent set problem in a graph, using tree decomposition

work.summary: As Sr. Software Engineer, I contributed to Apache Axis2/C project while in WSO2
highlights: Worked as a core developer for Apache Axis2/C project
Implemnted several transport layers for Axis2/C, including XMPP and TCP transports

awards.title: Amazon Certified Developer - Associate
awards.summary: Tested my knowledge on different parts of AWS infrastructure including SQS, SNS, Dynamodb and S3.

awards.title: Scrum Master
awards.summary: Took a two day training followed by a test to get Scrum Master certification.

awards.title: Google Summer of Code
awards.summary: Developed high performance XML parser, Guththila, for Apache Axis2/C.
